title: Murder By The Seaside: Episode 56
itunes:subtitle: Hastings is a quiet seaside town on the south coast of England.  In 1998 the town was rocked by two murders just eight days apart.  Ten years later, the murders remained unsolved, but then detectives received information from a most unlikely source tha...
content:encoded:
Hastings is a quiet seaside town on the south coast of England. In 1998 the town was rocked by two murders just eight days apart. Ten years later, the murders remained unsolved, but then detectives received information from a most unlikely source that changed everything.

Enjoy the podcast and want more? For just £3 per month listen to nine bonus episodes plus other exclusive content at www.patreon.com/uktruecrime

Want to talk about the show or any other aspect of UK True Crime? Join our friendly facebook group today: https://m.facebook.com/groups/1479468325433430
